Summary: Woke to dogs barking all dn st. saw bright light coming towards the house thiought it was a car got up closer to see it was a beam of light coming from the sky above (like a flashlight) huge light no sound or aircraft
divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up to the dogs all barking and sounded like there was something wrong jumped off the couch looked at the time and noticed a lot across the lot. Thought it was strange to see a light appear on the ground almost oval looking and extremly bright . I ran outside it was cold up to the fence 30 ft from light light bounced from one end of the lot to other. Looked up no sound no aircrat scared me dogs going wild all around got 2 ft from light ran inside grabbed my husband it was gone... Called police reported strange light and asked if any one has reported this strange light women on phone adviced me to call the local police... Weird but interesting. wanted to see more and get into the light...
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Santa Fe
There were no other sightings in Santa Fe on or around April 19th 2006
